description: Enterprise techniques used by dsquery, ATT&CK software S0105 (v1.4)
name: dsquery (S0105)

techniques.comment: [dsquery](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0105) can be used to gather information on user accounts within a domain.(Citation: TechNet Dsquery)(Citation: Mandiant APT41)
[dsquery](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0105) can be used to gather information on domain trusts with dsquery * -filter "(objectClass=trustedDomain)" -attr *.(Citation: Harmj0y Domain Trusts)
[dsquery](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0105) can be used to gather information on permission groups within a domain.(Citation: TechNet Dsquery)(Citation: Mandiant APT41)
[dsquery](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0105) has the ability to enumerate various information, such as the operating system and host name, for systems within a domain.(Citation: Mandiant APT41)
